channel.title: Regex on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Regex on TLDRBins

item.title: Grep
item.description: General grep '<STRING>' <FILE> Grep from Files Recursively grep -rni '<STRING>' <PATH> Grep from Binary grep -a '<STRING>' <FILE> Grep Hash from Binary with Perl Regex grep -aPo '[a-fA-F0-9]{32}' <FILE> Grep from Binaries Recusively grep -rHa "<STRING>" <PATH> Find Unique Char from a File cat <FILE> | od -cvA none -w1 | sort -bu | tr -d '\n' | tr -d ' '
